Game.Name: Simple 2960 Tomodachi Series Vol. 3 - The Itsudemo Puzzle - Massugu Soroete Straws (Japan)
Game.plot: The Simple 2960 Tomodachi Series Vol. 3: The Itsudemo Puzzle - Massugu Soroete Straws is a Miscellaneous game, developed by BeeWorks and published by D3Publisher,which was released in Japan in 2003.
